snippet.title: Behold the power of Bowser's Fury! (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
Something colossal is about to happen! Mario and Bowser Jr. team up for an all-new bonus adventure in Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury, coming February 12th!

Pre-order here: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch/Super-Mario-3D-World-Bowser-s-Fury-1832228.html?c=purchase&utm_medium=social&utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=SuperMario3DWorldBowsersFury%7C3DWorldBowserFuryRevealTrailer%7Co2VV%7Cm_id_NNqyvSgR2A%7C1832228%7Cw3

► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/user/NintendoUKofficial/?sub_confirmation=1

► Facebook Super Mario: https://facebook.com/SuperMarioUK
► Facebook Nintendo Switch: https://facebook.com/NintendoSwitchUK
► Twitter Nintendo UK: https://twitter.com/NintendoUK
► Twitter Super Mario UK: https://twitter.com/SuperMario_UK
► Instagram Nintendo UK: https://instagram.com/NintendoUK

#SuperMario3DWorld #NintendoSwitch #BowsersFury
